guild.description:
Here we go again...

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/post/66iv/ee_ubwXLfNg)

*Cabal*: n. the contrived schemes of a group of persons secretly united in a plot - also: a group engaged in such schemes.

*Powermod*: n. [short for power moderator] a person of power, usually a moderator on a structured website, that takes too many unpopulist stances

This guild is dedicated to whistleblowing and preventing powermods and the forming of a powermod oligarchy which would censor opinions and lead Ruqqus into the same corruption that is killing Reddit.

body:
When someone makes a post called "Yall can't behave!", my reaction is also to link to a site with... suicide statistics, inspirational quotes, a blog that hasn't been updated in 2 years, and an age gate that excludes 18 year olds and redirects you to Google if you say you're under 18. Very interesting choice there.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
When someone makes a post called "Yall can't behave!", my reaction is also to link to a site with... suicide statistics, inspirational quotes, a blog that hasn't been updated in 2 years, and an age gate that excludes 18 year olds and redirects you to Google if you say you're under 18. Very interesting choice there.

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]

body: Taking a minute amount of methadone actually will take out anyone without a tolerance. Very, very painless. You'll actually feel good about it. Methadone has a very calming, tranquil effect.  Don't let the fact that it was invented by nazis bother you,  it's actually used by opiate addicts to wean themselves off. It'll be the easiest decision you ever make, and you'll wonder why you never did it before.
